Name: Criminal Archives: City on Fire Collector's Edition
About the game: In this Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure: A string of mysterious murders has left San Francisco police stumped. Someone calling himself the Plague Doctor is committing arsons all around the city. But who’s going to shed light on these dark events? Of course, it will be you, the famous crime reporter writing your next sensational article – a story of a man fighting for justice in his own questionable way. Together with your partner, constable Melinda Watson, you’ll plunge into the maelstrom of lies, corruption, and vengeance. Find out who hides behind the Plague Doctor’s mask! And try to stop him till the city’s consumed by the flames… This Collector's Edition includes: Play the bonus chapter and save a small town from the violent moneylender! Replay your favorite hidden-object puzzles and mini-games to earn achievements! Collect all the morphing objects and notes to learn the city’s story! Use the helpful strategy guide if stuck!
